product_name: REI  Traverse 30 Pack - Women's - Special Buy
long_description: Get out of town and enjoy a walk in the wilderness with the REI Traverse 30 women's pack. It carries a full day's worth of gear while a contoured fit keeps you comfy over miles of trail.
short_description: Get out of town and enjoy a walk in the wilderness with the REI Traverse 30 women's pack. It carries a full day's worth of gear while a contoured fit keeps you comfy over miles of trail.
